data.title: Download Free PDF
data.meta_description:
José Saramago - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Dario Fo called José Saramago after winning the Nobel Prize in 1997 to say that Saramago deserved the prize and would likely win it the following year. 
2. In 1998, Saramago did win the Nobel Prize in Literature, becoming the first Portuguese language writer to win the prize.  
3. Saramago's win was widely celebrated by Portuguese language communities around the world and recognized the importance and richness of Portuguese literature.
